communityrequests-editfocusarea: Gudanar da yankin mayar da hankali kan jerin buƙatun al'umma
communityrequests-focus-area-not-found: Ba a samo wurin mayar da hankali [[$1]] ba ko kuma ba a adana shi da kyau ba.
communityrequests-wish-voting-info: Wannan fata a halin yanzu yana da ''' $1 {{PLURAL:$2| supporter|masu goyon baya}}'''.
communityrequests-wish-voting-info-open: Zaben wannan fata a bude yake har sai an kammala. Nuna goyon bayan ku ta amfani da maɓallin da ke ƙasa.
communityrequests-wish-voting-info-close: A halin yanzu an rufe kada kuri'a don wannan fata.
communityrequests-wish-voting-not-logged: Da fatan za a shiga don tallafawa wannan fata
communityrequests-focus-area-description: Bayyana wurin da aka fi mayar da hankali dalla-dalla, gami da iyakarsa da kuma yadda buri da aka keɓe ya yi daidai da juna.
communityrequests-focus-area-short-descr: Takaitaccen bayanin wurin mayar da hankali, wanda za'a nuna akan [[$1|shafin wuraren da aka fi mayar da hankali]] da [[$2|shafin gida]]. Ana ba da izinin haɗin kai da sauran sauƙi na wikitext.
communityrequests-focus-area-wishes-desc: A ƙasa akwai jerin buƙatun da suka sanar da wannan yanki na mayar da hankali. Ana iya ƙara ƙarin buri zuwa wannan tebur akan lokaci.
Zaɓen yankin da aka mayar da hankali ba shine tabbacin cewa kowane buri za a ba da shi a fili ba; maimakon haka, buri yana nuna matsalar gaba ɗaya.
Da zarar an karɓi yankin mai da hankali, ƙungiyar za ta yi aiki tare da al'ummomi don ba da fifiko da isar da mafita mafi tasiri.
communityrequests-focus-area-owners-desc: Ƙungiyoyin ƙungiyoyi waɗanda suka mallaki wannan yanki na mayar da hankali kuma suna da alhakin gudanarwa da ci gabanta. Ana ba da izinin haɗin kai da sauran sauƙi na wikitext.
communityrequests-focus-area-volunteers-: Idan akwai masu aikin sa kai waɗanda ba sa cikin ƙungiyar amma kuna son ba su ihu, jera su nan. Ana ba da izinin haɗin kai da sauran sauƙi na wikitext.
communityrequests-focus-area-voting-info: Wannan yankin mayar da hankali a halin yanzu yana da ''' $1 {{PLURAL:$2| supporter|masu goyon baya}}'''.
Zaɓen wannan yanki mai da hankali yana buɗe har sai an kammala. Nuna goyon bayan ku ta amfani da maɓallin da ke ƙasa.
A halin yanzu an rufe kada kuri'a don wannan yanki mai da hankali.
communityrequests-translation-translatab: Wannan shafin yana ƙunshe da rubutu wanda baya cikin yaren mu'amalar ku na yanzu. Kuna iya fassara shi ta hanyar [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/MinT Wikimedia's machine translation Tool].
apihelp-query+communityrequests-wishes-s: Sami jerin buƙatun daga jerin buƙatun Al'umma.
apihelp-query+communityrequests-wishes-p: Lambar yare don tace buri ta.
Abubuwan da ake so don samun.
Abubuwan da ake so don warwarewa ta.
Hanyar warware ta.
Matsakaicin adadin buri na dawowa.
Matsayin buri
Nau'in fata
Taken buri
Yankin mayar da hankali abin da ake so nasa ne
Bayanin buri
Ƙungiya ta farko na masu amfani waɗanda suka amfana da buri
Ayyukan da ake so suna da alaƙa
Sunan aikin kyauta, idan buri ba shi da alaƙa da kowane ɗayan ayyukan da aka lissafa
Ayyukan maharba masu alaƙa da buri
Mai amfani wanda ya ba da shawarar buri
Adadin masu amfani waɗanda suka goyi bayan buri
Kwanan wata da lokaci an halicci buri
Kwanan wata da lokaci an sabunta buri na ƙarshe
Tsara ta kwanan wata halitta
Tsara ta kwanan wata da aka sabunta
A ware ta adadin magoya baya
Tsara da take
right-manage-wishlist: Sarrafa lissafin fatan al'umma ba tare da hani ba
action-manage-wishlist: sarrafa jerin buƙatun Al'umma ba tare da hani ba
